text: Hagi pristi ne' Zadoki'ene, kasanampa ne' Netenikea Gihoni tinte Solomonina masavena asenifi taginteke kinia azeri oti'nake'za vahetmimo'za musena hu'za avoa nehage'za Jerusalemi rankumapina azageno, rankumapima mani'naza vahe'mo'zanena musena nehu'za avoa nehagaza agasasanke kagra nentahine.
